requirements.feature: Login / Signup, keeping user session alive
requirements.description: All tokens / credentials must be stored in keychain/keystore if they are persisted

requirements.feature: Storing environment variables
requirements.description: Environment variables cannot be stored in github repository. All envs should be stored in secrets on CI (e. g. Bitrise)

requirements.feature: App is using logs.
requirements.description: No sensitive data is written to application logs.

requirements.feature: Sensitive aplication logic
requirements.description:
Validate every update of a sensitive value with the server.
Do not validate sensitive features locally
For example:
- Admin mode
- Coins for premium features

requirements.feature: Hardcoded keys
requirements.description: App doesn't store sensitive hardcoded keys inside app and conforms to best practices of storing hardcoded keys.

requirements.feature: Login / signup
requirements.description: Do not store user password in local data storage.

requirements.feature: Third party service with API keys.
requirements.description:
Keys generated in Third Party service like Google Cloud should have minimum set of permissions.
It should have assigned bundleID / AppID to key, It will accept data only from those apps.

requirements.feature: Authentication requires to enter data (password, pin) through e.g. keyboard.
requirements.description: No sensitive data, such as passwords or pins, is exposed through the user interface. You have to use secure text entry for fields.

requirements.feature: App is making requests to REST API.
requirements.description: Whole communication should use only HTTPS protocol.

requirements.feature: Platforms with native obfuscation: Android, Flutter, React-Native.
requirements.description: Obfuscation should be configured. For Android: App should have proguard/r8 enabled.

requirements.feature: App is adding new permissions.
requirements.description: Review permissions and use only necessary.

requirements.feature: App has apple certificates, google keystore or other sensitive files.
requirements.description: Secure them in proper place and describe how it's achieved. E.g. make sure they are all stored only in 1pass and access has minimal amount of people.

requirements.feature: App is persisting data. App saves files.
requirements.description: No sensitive data is included in backups generated by the mobile operating system. Make sure that all files are saved in proper place.

requirements.feature: User can recover account.
requirements.description: The app doesn't rely on a single insecure communication channel (email or SMS) for critical operations, such as enrollments and account recovery. You should have possiblity to verify somehow user identity e.g. security questions, additional informtation about what happend in account.

requirements.feature: URLs passed outside of app (for example from API)
requirements.description: Validate url according whitelist of urls within app.

requirements.feature: Login / signup
requirements.description: Removing all data after logout, keychain, files, cache.

requirements.feature: User enter sensitive data or password into inputs.
requirements.description: Disable additional hardware keyboard connected to device, user can only use fabric one.

requirements.feature: Logout.
requirements.description: Invalidate access token through request to backend.

requirements.feature: Fintech app or very sensitive application
requirements.description: To increase security of the application it could be additionally protected with PIN screen.

requirements.feature: User shouldn't use jailbroken/rooted device.
requirements.description: The app detects and reacts to the presence of a rooted or jailbroken device either by alerting the user or terminating the app.

requirements.feature: The app informs the user of all sensitive activities with their account. Users are able to view a list of devices, view contextual information (IP address, location, etc.), and to block specific devices.
requirements.description: The app informs the user of all sensitive activities with their account. Users are able to view a list of devices, view contextual information (IP address, location, etc.), and to block specific devices.

requirements.feature: The app catches and handles possible exceptions.
requirements.description: Make sure you have added sentry, bugsnag or crashlitics or other to catch all crashes.

requirements.feature: Storing data using hashes
requirements.description: Hashed data should use unique (for every user) salt to increase the complexity of reversing the operation.

requirements.feature: Very sensitive applications like banking apps.
requirements.description: Two factor authentication

requirements.feature: App is recognizing device as trust device.
requirements.description: The app implements a 'device binding' functionality using a device fingerprint derived from multiple properties unique to the device.

requirements.feature: Login
requirements.description: Block App after number of login failures

requirements.feature: App receives data from user input
requirements.description: Input data should be properly validated to process it safely.

requirements.feature: App is using webview.
requirements.description: JavaScript is disabled in WebViews unless explicitly required.

requirements.feature: App has file upload.
requirements.description: Limit maximum number of files that can be uploaded at once.

requirements.feature: Persising user personal information (name, phone, email, ...) on the device
requirements.description: Persisted database should be encrypted when not used. Storage data should not be easily accessible and kept unencrypted

requirements.feature: Saving sensitive data in local storage (Keychain, SQLite, ...)
requirements.description: The app’s local storage should be wiped after an excessive number of failed authentication attempts

requirements.feature: Sending personal data outside of the application
requirements.description: All requests must be authenticated

requirements.feature: Transferin personal data through REST API
requirements.description: Certificate pinning should be implemented and HTTPS protocol used for network communication

requirements.feature: Displaying privacy policy screen during registration process
requirements.description: The privacy policy must be directly accepted by the user, you can use unchecked checkbox

requirements.feature: Using non-production environments
requirements.description: Non-production environments (development, staging, beta) **can not** contain any real personal data

requirements.feature: Application has input for user email address
requirements.description: Email input should be validated and limited in maximum characters to e.g. 100 characters

requirements.feature: User can play video in the application
requirements.description: Video data must be received through HTTPS protocol

requirements.feature: App is using location services.
requirements.description: Detect mocked location and let user know. Also check how it's affecting app and should it be possible to fake location.

requirements.feature: Using UITextField with sensitive data
requirements.description: Set autocorrectionType to .none in Sensitive UITextFields.

requirements.feature: Using NSURLSession
requirements.description:
By default NSURLSession stores data, such as HTTP requests and responses in the Cache.db database.
It should be disabled in URLSession with setting .ephemeral type instead of default one.

requirements.feature: Certificate Pinning implemetation using TrustKit
requirements.description:
Set kTSKDisableDefaultReportUri to true
By default this flag is false, which means it will be sending error reports to tool owner.

requirements.feature: Default
requirements.description:
Verify if not needed files are not included in the bundle.
Exclude them if needed using EXCLUDED_SOURCE_FILE_NAMES

requirements.feature: User enter sensitive data or password into inputs.
requirements.description: Verify that the app prevents usage of custom third-party keyboards whenever sensitive data is entered.

requirements.feature: Using external libraries.
requirements.description: External libraries should be linked staticly.

requirements.feature: Text fields with sensitive data
requirements.description:
Set Text suggestions to .none
android:inputType="textNoSuggestions"

requirements.feature:
Android App, when app shows sensitive data like medical, banking, etc.
Easy to implement, but it should not be implemented over usability in some apps like messenger.
requirements.description:
Android Screenshot / screen recording preventing,
Android offers a screenshot feature that can be used by the user or by the system for recent apps.
Due to that reason screenshots should be disable for sensitive data.

requirements.feature: Fields with sensitive data that should not be copied.
requirements.description: Secure fields with sensitive data from coping them by other apps and User.
